page.title: 01Walton and Street
page.content: This block lies close to the middle of Somerset, with the village of {Walton}near to its centre. It is an agricultural area with over twenty five farms spread throughout the block. In the east is the edge of the town of{Street,}with a large industrial estate owned by shoemakers{Clarks, and the western residential area of the town. The south of the block is bordered by the low line of the{Polden Hills} (maximum height 77m). With Walton Windmill the only major landmark in the area. The block is split in half by the A39 road, an important east-west route through Somerset, linking towns and villages to the national motorway network at junction 23 on the M5 near Bridgwater.
